actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Reserve Act respecting the positions of Chairman and Vice Chairman of the Federal Reserve Board.

summary.text: Federal Reserve Act Amendments - Amends the Federal Reserve Act to change the expiration dates of the terms of office of the chairman and the vice chairman of the Federal Reserve Board of Governors from the end of four years to January 31 of the first calendar year commencing after the calendar year during which the term of the President who appointed them is scheduled to expire, or at the expiration of their terms as members of the Board, whichever is earlier. Enunciates the duties of the vice chairman of the Board.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Reserve Act respecting the positions of Chairman and Vice Chairman of the Federal Reserve Board.
